Study population consist patient `` true '' coronary bifurcation ( Medina 1.0.1 ; 0.1.1 ; 1.1.1 ) > 50 % stenosis main ( MB ) side branch ( SB ) . Patients schedule undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) base clinical finding . Before PCI , patient undergo multislice CT angiography ( MSCTA ) . MSCTA PCI `` true '' non leave main bifurcation lesion determine atherosclerotic plaque characteristic MB SB predict significant narrow SB provisional stenting . Primary goal determine plaque characteristic `` true '' non leave main bifurcation lesion MB SB , assess MSCTA , affect occurrence SB ostial compromise provisional stenting . Patients see office visit 1 , 3 , 6 12 month procedure . Clinical evaluation 12-channel ECG mandatory visit . Comprehensive echocardiogram 2D-strain analysis do 3-month visit . Repeated coronary angiography do 6-month visit , include quantitative analysis previously treat bifurcation lesion .
DOC.brief_title: Multislice CT Angiography Coronary Bifurcations Outcomes After Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , observational study , conduct two high-volume university PCI center . The center : Clinical Hospital Center Zemun-Belgrade , Cardiology Department , Clinical Center Serbia , Cardiology Clinic . Study population consist patient `` true '' coronary bifurcation ( Medina 1.0.1 ; 0.1.1 ; 1.1.1 ) > 50 % stenosis MB SB9 . Patients schedule undergo PCI base clinical finding . Before PCI , patient undergo MSCTA . Study hypothesis MSCTA PCI `` true '' non leave main bifurcation lesion determine atherosclerotic plaque characteristic MB SB predict significant narrow SB provisional stenting . Primary goal determine plaque characteristic `` true '' non leave main bifurcation lesion MB SB , assess MSCTA , affect occurrence SB ostial compromise provisional stenting . Plaque characteristic investigate include : angle artery , degree stenosis , length stenosis , density plaque , plaque volume , positive remodel artery , presence spotty calcification . Secondary aim determine whether MSCTA correctly identify degree stenosis atherosclerotic plaque composition MB SB bifurcation lesion compare invasive quantitative coronary angiography IVUS . Also determine correlation endothelial wall shear stress , compute use mathematical model fluid dynamic reconstruction MSCTA finding , degree stenosis atherosclerotic plaque composition MB SB bifurcation lesion . Another goal determine correlation SB stenosis coronary blood flow provisional stenting regional myocardial function assess myocardial deformation image echocardiography area leave ventricle supply SB , immediately intervention , three month . Study patient select base previous diagnostic coronary angiogram . They undergo MSCTA Toshiba Aquilion CXL 128 slice CT scanner use predefined protocol . The procedure include calcium scoring ( Agatston ) CT angiography use Ultravist 370 contrast agent ( ( iopromide concentration 370 mg/ml , Bayer Health Care , Germany ) . MSCTA angiograms analyze use dedicate software Vital Vitrea Advanced 6.2 , Vital Images , Minnetonka , Minnesota , US . The bifurcation lesion analyse include : measurement angle MB SB , measurement lesion length , reference diameter vessel , degree stenosis , atherosclerotic plaque analysis 10 mm proximal distal MB , 5 mm ostium SB , level maximum stenosis ( minimal lumen diameter ) . Plaque analysis include : 1 . Type tissue base density : lipid , fibro-lipid calcify , 2 . Plaque volume level bifurcation 3 . Positive remodel artery level bifurcation 4 . Presence spotty calcification . Before PCI procedure , IVUS evaluation use iLab® Ultrasound Imaging System ( Boston Scientific , Natick , Massachusetts , US ) , MB , possible , SB perform . Automated pullback 0.5 mm/s use evaluate branch PCI procedure . Initial strategy PCI provisional stenting . The choice vascular access , guide catheter coronary wire leave operator ' discretion . Heparin dose 80-100 IU/kg use periprocedural anticoagulation . After place guidewires MB SB lesion , MB predilated . After predilation nitroglycerin administration intracoronary , coronary angiogram perform . Based angiogram , second generation drug elute stent ( DES ) place MB across SB , diameter choose accord Murray 's law . The stent long enough proximal margin stent least 10 mm proximal carina bifurcation . After stenting , proximal optimization ( POT ) stent MB perform use short noncompliant balloon catheter 0,5 mm large diameter stent . The distal marker balloon catheter position level carina . Inflation balloon catheter must least nominal diameter . After POT intracoronary nitroglycerin administration , coronary angiogram two orthogonal projection do . If SB 75 % diameter stenosis ( DS ) quantitative coronary angiography analysis ( QCA ) and/or coronary blood flow less TIMI III , procedure finish . If SB 75 % DS stenosis TIMI flow < III , procedure continue guidewire exchange , preferably third guide wire insert distal strut SB . After predilatation SB ostium , kiss inflation do use adequately size noncompliant balloon catheter MB SB , 6-8 atm . After control coronary angiogram , SB 75 % DS , TIMI flow < III ostial dissection , another DES implant SB use technique choose operator . The preferred technique T protrusion ( TAP ) . After procedure , patient uneventful PCI stay hospital 24 h. Blood sample Troponin I , CK CK-MB collect 12 24 h procedure , C reactive protein ( CRP ) 24h . Complications intervention document patient study file . Patients see office visit 1 , 3 , 6 12 month procedure . Clinical evaluation 12-channel ECG mandatory visit . Comprehensive echocardiogram 2D-strain analysis do 3-month visit . Repeated coronary angiography do 6-month visit , include QCA analysis previously treat bifurcation lesion .
DOC.criteria: Patient sign informed consent form prior enter study Patient stable angina pectoris , silent ischemia , proven coronary ischemia functional testing . Patient medical condition contraindication MSCTA and/or PCI , i. e. inability hold breath 15 sec , atrial fibrillation uncontrolled heart rate . Patient allergy aspirin , clopidogrel contrast agent . Patient active peptic ulcer . Patient `` true '' bifurcation lesion detect diagnostic coronary angiogram . `` True '' bifurcation lesion define significant stenosis MB SB ( Medina class 1.0.1 ; 0.1.1 ; 1.1.1 ) . SB must diameter great 2 mm adequately visualized MSCTA . Patient heavy calcification site bifurcation plan treat , base MSCTA finding ( circumferential calcification great 180° , length 5 mm site bifurcation ) Patient suffer renal failure estimate creatinine clearance le 30 ml/min . Patients creatinine clearance 3060 ml/min must adequately hydrate MSCTA PCI . Patient suffer manifest heart failure , LVEF < 30 % . The bifurcation lesion plan treat study within culprit artery cause myocardial infarction , and/or graft surgically treat PCI procedure enter study . Patient allergy aspirin , clopidogrel contrast agent . Patient active peptic ulcer .
